name: Against the Cold
description:
It's cold outside! Gather sticks to keep your fire lit, but watch out for the angry snowmen. They will try to put out the fire at all costs.

Use arrow keys to move, space to interact. More instructions available in game

Made in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace Gamejam, theme Survival. 

Art Assets by Kenney, Player sprite from Canari Games

Music and Sound from Pixabay
